channel.title: Coding help?:(
channel.description:
How can you make tele commands?
I'm looking to make a war zone.
But I need:
::team1 ::team2
How do I make those commands?
-- How do I add in the coords?
---------------------------------------------------------- Another question:
Can you make spells splash? (SO that you need mage +bonus to make a spell hit?)(Like on real rs) ---
And another one. How make tb's work:(?

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:5, topic:152688”]bed240 you left out heigt level so if you happen to be upstairs or in a dungeon then you will be above or below also you should have a

sendMessage("Welcome to Team1");

Solution to your magic problem

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(369, 3, 3); hitDiff = 2* BonusMagic teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }[/quote]

You can’t expect everyone to have the same methods, i mean… if i put.

hitDiff = 2* BonusMagic… I would get errors. And please, explain more thouroughly…

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

no it just takes ther Magic bonus you have and times it by two to get your hit diff for ice barrage. e.g magic bonus = 10 yor hit diff will be 20

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @temuz temuz
item.description:
@temuz wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:5, topic:152688”]bed240 you left out heigt level so if you happen to be upstairs or in a dungeon then you will be above or below also you should have a

sendMessage("Welcome to Team1");

Solution to your magic problem

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(369, 3, 3); hitDiff = 2* BonusMagic teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }[/quote]
Is it like real rs? That you need mage att. bonus to hit?

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

bed240 you left out heigt level so if you happen to be upstairs or in a dungeon then you will be above or below also you should have a

sendMessage("Welcome to Team1");

Solution to your magic problem

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(369, 3, 3); hitDiff = 2* BonusMagic teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @temuz temuz
item.description:
@temuz wrote:

Thanks. And for the mage thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("team1") && playerRights >= 0) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }

change the #### to the co ordinated.
and the playersrights bit were the “0” is you can change that to say 1 so only mods and above can tele there or 2 so only admins can or 3 so only owner can or 0 when everyone can hope this helped.

and just make the same 1 with different coords for team2 and change were it says “team1” to “team2”.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help?:(
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("team1") { teleportToX = X co-ord teleportToY = Y co-ord heightLevel = 0; }
Voila! just change the co-ords and the command and hey presto

Read full topic
